::Koj::

Koj looked at the 2 missiles closing as 1 slammed into his side sending 
rolling striping the flesh and metal from Koj's side causing him to hitting 
his head against the CF knocking him out cold. As he looked around seeing a 
human man

                       ::In Koj's Head::
::Koj::
"Master Fe Ling am I dead?"

::Fe Ling::
Fe Ling smoking his pipe "Not yet but if you don't get up you will be now 
get up and remember who your you are Koj Of The Silver Dragon Clan use your 
power boy and is the word you seek Maximize."

                            ::The Real World::
::Koj::

Koj opens his Eyes "MAXIMIZE" As he does he transforms in to 5'2 white Robot 
with no marking besides a Sliver dragon on his upper arm and a six inch 
blade sticking out of his forehead while his long mane of sliver hair rolls 
down his back with two cat ears sticking out the top. Watching the second 
missile close he raises his left hand as it splits in 1/2 and Fires 4 Ninja 
stars causing it to explode. "Hold your Fire I'm a Maximal." As he to 
thrusters extend out of his back.
